faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.what_is_sprunkr_content: Sprunkr is an innovative music creation game that combines rhythm gaming with creative music production. It's designed to make music creation fun and accessible while helping you develop real musical skills. You can create beats, melodies, and full songs through an intuitive interface that makes music theory approachable and enjoyable.
faq.unique_feature_1: Gamified learning approach to music theory
faq.unique_feature_2: Real-time visual feedback on your musical creations
faq.unique_feature_4: Community features for sharing and collaborating
faq.how_to_start_title: How do I get started with Sprunkr?
faq.start_step_1: Click the "Play" button in the navigation menu
faq.start_step_2: Choose a game mode (Tutorial recommended for beginners)
faq.start_step_3: Follow the interactive tutorial to learn the basics
faq.mode_challenge_desc: Complete musical tasks to earn rewards
faq.challenge_feature_1: Daily challenges with unique musical objectives
faq.challenge_feature_5: Global leaderboards to track your progress
faq.tool_1: Virtual Instruments: Piano, drums, synths, strings, etc.
faq.tool_3: Sound Library: Professional samples and loops
faq.ai_title: How does the AI assistance work?
faq.ai_feature_1: Melody suggestions based on your style
faq.improve_title: How do I improve my skills?
faq.devices_title: What devices can I play Sprunkr on?
faq.devices_content: Sprunkr works on any modern web browser, including desktop computers, laptops, tablets, and mobile phones. Just visit our website and start playing!
faq.install_title: Do I need to install anything?
faq.install_content: No installation required! Sprunkr runs directly in your web browser. Just make sure you have a modern browser with JavaScript enabled.
faq.requirements_title: What are the minimum system requirements?
faq.requirements_intro: Sprunkr is designed to run smoothly on most devices. You'll need:
faq.req_1: A modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge)
faq.free_content: Yes, Sprunkr is completely free to play! We offer optional premium features for enhanced creativity, but the core game experience is always free.
faq.account_needed_title: Do I need an account to play?
faq.account_needed_content: You can try Sprunkr without an account, but creating a free account allows you to save your creations, track your progress, and join the community.
faq.more_questions_content: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Feel free to contact us.
